sentences.sContent: They attempted to appease international opposition by promising to hold talks.
sentences.sCn: 他们答应举行会谈，试图以此平息国际上的反对声音。

synos.tran: 使平息；使满足；使和缓；对…让步

remMethod.val: ap (加强) + pease (看作peace， 和平) → 平息

words.tran: 缓和得了的；劝解得了的；平息得了的

trans.tranCn: 平息； 安抚， 缓和； 满足
trans.tranOther: to make someone less angry or stop them from attacking you by giving them what they want
